perks.name: Magic XP Boost
perks.description: Gain 15% more Enchanting and Alchemy XP.

perks.name: Arcane Catalyst
perks.description: Spells deal 15% increased damage.

perks.name: Astral Negotiator
perks.description: Enchanting and anvils costs -15% less experience.

perks.name: Mining Fiesta
perks.description: Schedules two Mining Fiesta events during the year! Earn 1.5x Mining exp, 2x drops and Unique Loot! Only active on public islands.

perks.name: Mining XP Buff
perks.description: Earn 1.5x Mining experience on public islands.

perks.name: Prospection
perks.description: Mining minions work 25% faster.

perks.name: EZPZ
perks.description: Gain 10 extra bonus score in Dungeons.

perks.name: Marauder
perks.description: Dungeon reward chests are 20% cheaper.

perks.name: Benediction
perks.description: Blessings are 25% stronger.

perks.name: Pet XP Buff
perks.description: Gain 35% more pet XP.

perks.name: Lucky!
perks.description: Gain +25â€‰Pet Luck.

perks.name: Mythological Ritual
perks.description: Mayor Diana will sell the Griffin Pet, which lets you find Mythological Creatures and tons of unique items.

perks.name: Fishing XP Buff
perks.description: Gain 50% more fishing XP on public islands.

perks.name: Luck of the Sea 2.0
perks.description: Gain +15 Sea Creature Chance.

perks.name: Fishing Festival
perks.description: Start a special fishing event during the first 3 days of each month! Fish and fight dangerous Sharks and earn unique Shark loot.

perks.name: Slayer XP Buff
perks.description: Earn 25% more Slayer XP.

perks.name: Pathfinder
perks.description: Gain rare drops 20% more often.

perks.name: SLASHED Pricing
perks.description: Starting Slayer quests is half price.

perks.name: Sweet Tooth
perks.description: Grants +20% chance to get candy from mobs during the Spooky Festival.

perks.name: Benevolence
perks.description: Gain 2.5x gifts from the attack on Jerry's Workshop.

perks.name: Extra Event
perks.description: Schedules an extra event during the year.

perks.name: Barrier Street
perks.description: Gain 25% more bank interest.

perks.name: Shopping Spree
perks.description: Increase daily NPC buy limits by 10x.

perks.name: Bribe
perks.description: If Scorpius wins and you voted for him, Mayor Scorpius will offer you 50,000 coins - 1,000,000 coins as a token of gratitude.

perks.name: Darker Auctions
perks.description: Scorpius will intrude in Dark Auctions, increasing the number of rounds to 7 and offering special items.

perks.name: TURBO MINIONS!!!
perks.description: Minions have double the output!

perks.name: AH CLOSED!!!
perks.description: The Auction House will be closed while Derpy is elected!

perks.name: DOUBLE MOBS HP!!!
perks.description: ALL monsters have double health!

perks.name: MOAR SKILLZ!!!
perks.description: Gain +50% more skill experience!

perks.name: Perkpocalypse
perks.description: Activates all perks of another mayor every 18 SkyBlock days (6 hours).

perks.name: Statspocalypse
perks.description: Increases all stats by 10%.

perks.name: Jerrypocalypse
perks.description: Reveal hidden Jerries from logging, farming, mining, and killing mobs.

perks.name: Order
perks.description: Establish order

perks.name: Security
perks.description: Strengthen security

perks.name: Freedom
perks.description: Freedom from fear

perks.name: Blood God's Blessing
perks.description: Gain +50% more skill experience!

perks.name: Shrine of the Blood God
perks.description: Summons the Blood God Shrine and its shiny pigs.

perks.name: Unlimited Speed
perks.description: Grants everyone +50 Speed! The speed cap will be removed but speed above 400 will be halved.

perks.name: Potato Crown's Radiance
perks.description: Farming minions have double the output!

perks.name: Anarchy
perks.description: There are no taxes in the Auction House and Bazaar.
